title: Champion Shards should not be in hex tech boxes
body:
Champion skin shards being in boxes is a real let down i have every champion in the game no use for blue essence. free boxes for events are far in between and to get a champion shard every time has been a big letdown. I will no longer purchase boxes orbs ect because of this fact. I am asking the league community to back me up on this as well as riot themselves as a company this is not a fair thing. Please look into this I know others who feel the same.
                                                                                                                                                  -ispro
